languages.text: Выждав положенные по уставу десять минут, мы проверили фильтрационные маски, вышибли ворота залпами мельта-пушек наших танков и ринулись внутрь.

traits.locale_text: Выждав положенные по уставу десять минут, мы проверили противогазы, вышибли ворота залпами мельта-пушек наших танков и ринулись внутрь.

languages.text: As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.
languages.original_text: Выждав положенные по уставу десять минут, мы проверили фильтрационные маски, вышибли ворота залпами мельта-пушек наших танков и ринулись внутрь.

traits.locale_text: As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.
As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.

As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.

languages.text: 按照规定，我们一直等待着，等到毒云彻底遮蔽视线之后才动手。我们检查了过滤面罩，用坦克的热熔炮轰开了大门，随后冲了进去。
languages.original_text: As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.

traits.locale_text: 按照规定，我们一直等待着，等到毒云彻底遮蔽视线之后才动手。我们检查了过滤面罩，用坦克的热熔炮轰开了大门，随后冲了进去。

languages.text: Conformément à la réglementation, nous avons attendu que le nuage toxique commence à se dissiper, vérifié nos masques filtrants, enfoncé les portes avec les charges à fusion de nos chars et donné l'assaut.
languages.original_text: As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.

traits.locale_text: Conformément à la réglementation, nous avons attendu que le nuage toxique commence à se dissiper, vérifié nos masques filtrants, enfoncé les portes avec les charges à fusion de nos chars et donné l'assaut.

languages.text: 我々は規定に従いガス雲で視界が最低限まで低下するのを待ち、フィルターマスクを確認し、戦車のメルタをゲートに放射して突入した。
languages.original_text: As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.

traits.locale_text: 我々は規定に従いガス雲で視界が最低限まで低下するのを待ち、フィルターマスクを確認し、戦車のメルタをゲートに放射して突入した。

languages.text: Como dictan las regulaciones, esperamos a que la nube de gas permitiera un mínimo de visibilidad, comprobamos el filtro de nuestras máscaras, volamos las puertas con las armas de fusión de los tanques y entramos.
languages.original_text: As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.

traits.locale_text: Como dictan las regulaciones, esperamos a que la nube de gas permitiera un mínimo de visibilidad, comprobamos el filtro de nuestras máscaras, volamos las puertas con las armas de fusión de los tanques y entramos.

languages.text: Wie vorgeschrieben warteten wir, bis die Gaswolke eine minimale Sicht erlaubte, überprüften unsere Filtermasken, sprengten die Tore mit den Meltern unserer Panzer und stürmten hinein.
languages.original_text: As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.

traits.locale_text: Wie vorgeschrieben warteten wir, bis die Gaswolke eine minimale Sicht erlaubte, überprüften unsere Filtermasken, sprengten die Tore mit den Meltern unserer Panzer und stürmten hinein.

languages.text: Yönetmelikler gereği gaz bulutu yüzünden görünürlük asgari seviyeye gelene dek bekleyip maske filtrelerimizi kontrol ettik. Sonra da tanklarımızın meltalarını kullanarak kapıları patlatıp içeri daldık.
languages.original_text: As per regulations, we waited until the gas cloud allowed minimal visibility, checked our filter masks, blasted the gates with our tanks' meltas, and charged in.
